report.name: a2kcdp01

dataSource.name: Q_A2KCDP01
dataSource.select: -- 22/02/2001 O. Duprey premiere version de A2KCDP01 -- realisee a partir de AMTCDP01 -- suite a la fiche EvolBIP 16 SELECT 'pagea', to_number(substr(pack_amtcdp01. f_get_dossproj(bip.dpcode,'rien','rien'),1,5)) As dc_dpcode, substr(pack_amtcdp01. f_get_dossproj(bip.dpcode,doss.dplib,'rien'),1,35) As dc_dplib, substr(pack_amtcdp01. f_get_dossproj(bip.dpcode,doss.dplib,mo.clisigle),1,8) As dc_mo, bip.pid AS dc_pid, SUBSTR(bip.pnom, 1, 24) AS dc_pnom, ------------- Statut et Date du statut ------------------------------------ substr(DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens) ,bip.adatestatut,Decode(bip.astatut,null,'',bip.astatut),'') ,1,10) AS dc_statut, substr(DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens ), bip.adatestatut, bip.astatut, ' ' ),1,10) AS dc_statuta, substr(DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens ), bip.adatestatut, TO_CHAR(bip.adatestatut, 'MM/YYYY'), NULL ),1,10) AS dc_adatestatut, ------------------------ Montant jusqu'a fevrier 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_janvier, ------------------------ Montant a partir de mars 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 3, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_mars, ------------------------ Montant total annee 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, '2001', 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_total FROM ligne_bip bip, dossier_projet doss, client_mo mo, datdebex bex WHERE bip.dpcode=doss.dpcode AND bip.clicode=mo.clicode -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) -- Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) -- Restrictions sur Type projet AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) -- BEG TEST DE HUNG et NOI AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM proplus pro WHERE bip.pid = pro.factpid AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex4sst WHERE codex = pro.aist ) AND ( (pro.societe != 'SG..') OR (pro.societe IS NULL) ) AND ( (pro.qualif NOT IN ('GRA', 'MO')) OR (pro.qualif IS NULL) ) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) ) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) -- END TEST DE HUNG et NOI (voir commentaire dans l'onglet Comment de ce fenetre) -- AND doss.dpcode IN (90088, 93345, 93351, 93371, 93376, 93379) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ORDER BY bip.dpcode, bip.pid
dataSource.comment: - 28/6/6000 : QHL / NCM : Prises en compte des lignes bip ayant quelques décalages !!! - 2/8/2000 : QHL nouveau champ de DATDEBEX à prendre en compte : moismens au lieu de cmensuelle -1 ou -2 !!!

dataDescriptor.expression: substr ( DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , Decode ( bip.astatut , null , '' , bip.astatut ) , '' ) , 1 , 10 )
substr ( DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , bip.astatut , ' ' ) , 1 , 10 )
substr ( DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , TO_CHAR ( bip.adatestatut , 'MM/YYYY' ) , NULL ) , 1 , 10 )

dataSource.name: Q_A2KCDRECAP
dataSource.select: -- 2/8/2000 QHL remplace les datdebex.cmensuelle par datdebex.moismens SELECT 'pageb', to_number(substr(pack_amtcdp01. f_get_dossproj(bip.dpcode,'rien','rien'),1,5)) As dc_dpcode_r, substr(pack_amtcdp01. f_get_dossproj(bip.dpcode,doss.dplib,'rien'),1,25) As dc_dplib_r, ----- Statut et Date du statut substr(DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens) ,bip.adatestatut,Decode(bip.astatut,null,'',bip.astatut),'') ,1,10) AS dc_statut_r, ------------------------ Montant jusqu'a fevrier 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_janvier_r, ------------------------ Montant a partir de mars 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 3, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_mars_r, ------------------------ Montant total annee 2000 ------------------------------ pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, '2001', 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_2000_total_r FROM ligne_bip bip, dossier_projet doss, datdebex bex WHERE bip.dpcode=doss.dpcode -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) -- ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) -- Restrictions sur Type projet AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) -- -- BEG TEST DE HUNG et NOI voir commentaire dans l'onglet Comment de la fenetre Q_AMTCDP01 -- Restriction sur Proplus et prendre les lignes bip dans ligne_bip qui n'existent pas dans histo_amort AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM proplus pro WHERE bip.pid = pro.factpid AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex4sst WHERE codex = pro.aist ) AND ( (pro.societe != 'SG..') OR (pro.societe IS NULL) ) AND ( (pro.qualif NOT IN ('GRA', 'MO')) OR (pro.qualif IS NULL) ) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) ) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) -- END TEST DE HUNG et NOI AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ORDER BY bip.dpcode

dataDescriptor.expression: substr ( DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , Decode ( bip.astatut , null , '' , bip.astatut ) , '' ) , 1 , 10 )

dataSource.name: Q_date
dataSource.select: -- 2/8/2000 QHL remplace les datdebex.cmensuelle par datdebex.moismens SELECT substr(TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'),1,4) As dc_ancouran, substr(TO_CHAR(bex.moismens, 'MM/YYYY'),1,8) AS dc_datder_mens FROM datdebex bex

dataSource.name: Q_a2kcdstat
dataSource.select: SELECT 'pagec', max(substr(DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens) ,bip.adatestatut,Decode(bip.astatut,null,'',bip.astatut),'') ,1,10)) AS dc_statut_s, ------------------------ Montant jusqu'a fevrier 2000 ------------------------------ sum(pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_2000_janvier_s, ------------------------ Montant a partir de mars 2000 ------------------------------ sum(pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_an_mois(bip.pid, 2000, 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_2000_mars_s, ------------------------ Montant total annee 2000 ------------------------------ sum(pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, '2001', 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_2000_total_s FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) -- BEG TEST DE HUNG et NOI -- Restriction sur Proplus et prendre les lignes bip dans ligne_bip qui n'existent pas dans histo_amort AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM proplus pro WHERE bip.pid = pro.factpid AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex4sst WHERE codex = pro.aist ) AND ( (pro.societe != 'SG..') OR (pro.societe IS NULL) ) AND ( (pro.qualif NOT IN ('GRA', 'MO')) OR (pro.qualif IS NULL) ) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) ) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) -- END TEST DE HUNG et NOI AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) GROUP BY DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens) ,bip.adatestatut,Decode(bip.astatut,null,'',bip.astatut),'')

dataDescriptor.expression: max ( substr ( DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , Decode ( bip.astatut , null , '' , bip.astatut ) , '' ) , 1 , 10 ) )

textSegment.string: --- ALIMENTATION DU COMPTE IMMOBILISATION EN COURS ---
